control.viewcomunication

Class ViewDecoratorImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • control.viewcomunication.ViewDecoratorImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ViewDecorator

    public class ViewDecoratorImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ViewDecorator
    A decorator for view that makes thread safe methods and calculates scenes dimension starting to screen resolution.
    Author:
    Matteo Magnani
